EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_PaaS Survey_Q314.Email A
EmailTemplate.subject: Application Development Survey Invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Leading analyst firm Enterprise Management Associates (EMA) is researching trends in application development and Platform-as-a-Service. Please share your experience and in return get the report to see how your dev and IT team peers are dealing with the new challenges and opportunities of building cloud apps. START SURVEY <https://www.google.com/url?q=http://v2.decipherinc.com/survey/selfserve/1510/140609?utm_source%3DPivotal%26utm_medium%3Demail%26utm_campaign%3DPaaSQ32014&sa=D&usg=ALhdy2-BPJYJ_wVy8r0xTZ4aLYjjppuzVA> Topic: Application Development and Platform-as-a-Service Incentive: Comprehensive analyst report and guidance on trends and best practices in application development and deployment Length: 15 minutes
To begin this survey, please click here <https://www.google.com/url?q=http://v2.decipherinc.com/survey/selfserve/1510/140609?utm_source%3DPivotal%26utm_medium%3Demail%26utm_campaign%3DPaaSQ32014&sa=D&usg=ALhdy2-BPJYJ_wVy8r0xTZ4aLYjjppuzVA>. The Pivotal Team
